bibl.title: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to Currier McEwen, November 26, 1952

div1.p: Hench reports to McEwen that the Cubans are delighted about the wreath in memory of Reed at the Camp Lazear dedication.

div1.head: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to Currier McEwen, November 26, 1952
div1.p:
WESTERN
UNION
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
1206

Send the following message, subject to the terms on back hereof, which are hereby agreed to
November 26, 1952 DR. CURRIER MCEWEN
477 FIRST AVENUE
NEW YORK, NEW YORK

CUBANS DELIGHTED ABOUT REED MEMORIAL WREATH. SUGGEST WIRE DOCTOR JAYNE TO
CONTACT IMMEDIATELY DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA OR DR. RODRIGUEZ EXPOSITO, MARTI 219,
HAVANA OR CALL ME HOTEL NACIONAL HAVANA THIS SUNDAY. HEARTY THANKS
